channel.title: Going in Reverse :: SANS Holiday Hack Challenge 2025
channel.description: Objective Difficulty: 2/5 Kevin in the Retro Store needs help rewinding tech and going in reverse. Extract the flag and enter it here. Kevin McFarland mission statement Hello, I’m Kevin (though past friends have referred to me as ‘Heavy K’). If you ever hear any one say that philosophy is a useless college degree, don’t believe them; it’s not. I’ve arrived where I am at because of it. It just made the path more interesting.
